channel.title: Projects on Chris Turner
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chris Turner

item.title: Exploratory Analysis Project
item.description: Introduction The two datasets that I choose for this project are: Energy Census and Economic Data in the United States from 2010-2014 and Pollution levels in the US from 2000-2016. The Energy and Census data set contains the region, total energy consumption per year, total energy production, and total expidentures per year in each state. Moreover, the Pollution dataset contains four different pollutants: Methane, Ozone, Nitrogen Dioxide, and Sulfur Dioxide found in the different states of the US.

item.title: Modeling, Testing and Predicting
